title: Idea: Keen dreams done with Game Maker
content: I have no idea of this is a good idea [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-stunned.gif[/img]  but I need to know if anyone would be interested in making an Keen Dreams clone with Game Maker. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]  [img]http://images.ucomics.com/comics/ga/2005/ga050705.gif[/img]

title: Re: Idea: Keen dreams done with Game Maker
content:
People have made Keen games with Game Maker.
The best GM engine of CK is R.O.C.K. (recreation of commander keen) so that could be used with different graphics.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: R.O.C.K.? Where?
content:
Why make a clone? How about an ORIGINAL game?-----
[img]http://gnosticus.spatang.com/PBF056BCPuppyWish.jpg[/img]

title: I LOVE KEEN DREAMS!!! :)
content: Because Keen Dreams is my favorite Keen episode. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] [img]http://images.ucomics.com/comics/ga/2005/ga050705.gif[/img]

title: Re: I LOVE KEEN DREAMS!!! :)
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Why make a clone? How about an ORIGINAL game?[hr][/quote]

Hear hear![img]http://www.geocities.com/miniopolis/soul.txt[/img]

title: Re: I LOVE KEEN DREAMS!!! :)
content: Good luck, KD is fun game. There's currently 3D version of it under work by someone-I-can't-remember.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: I LOVE KEEN DREAMS!!! :)
content: [quote]Quote:[hr]There's currently 3D version of it under work by someone-I-can't-remember.[hr][/quote] I've heard about that.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Can't wait until it's finished![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] [img]http://images.ucomics.com/comics/ga/2005/ga050705.gif[/img]

title: Re: I LOVE KEEN DREAMS!!! :)
content: i dont see the point of making a clone unless just for fun or practice at making your own game. but yes, the ROCK engine is quite nice! good luck with whatever you decide to do.

title: Re: I LOVE KEEN DREAMS!!! :)
content: The ROCK game is in one topic. Luckily its still there.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: I LOVE KEEN DREAMS!!! :)
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr] Because Keen Dreams is my favorite Keen episode. [hr][/quote]

Well, then add your own twist or something. It's needs to be remotely advantageous to just playing the original, otherwise it's a waste of time.-----
[img]http://gnosticus.spatang.com/PBF056BCPuppyWish.jpg[/img]

title: Re: I LOVE KEEN DREAMS!!! :)
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]The ROCK game is in one topic. Luckily its still there.[hr][/quote]

Cool![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] Can you send me an link?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] I can't find it.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] [img]http://images.ucomics.com/comics/ga/2005/ga050705.gif[/img]

title: Re: I LOVE KEEN DREAMS!!! :)
content:
Well you're not gonna get much with the game maker.
If you really want a good engine, check out Z-1's keen engine (its in the "somenamegame" topic, but theres no links to the demo, sorry.) You'll have to wait till he posts a new demo.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Z-1's keen engine
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Well you're not gonna get much with the game maker.[hr][/quote]

Yeah. I've made an Keen fan game with it but the levels were terrible and there were no enemies. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-stunned.gif[/img] Basically it was horrible. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]

[quote]Quote:[hr]If you really want a good engine, check out Z-1's keen engine (its in the "somenamegame" topic, but theres no links to the demo, sorry.) You'll have to wait till he posts a new demo.[hr][/quote]

I've heard about that.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Can't wait for the full![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] [img]http://images.ucomics.com/comics/ga/2005/ga050705.gif[/img]

title: Re: Z-1's keen engine
content:
if you want to make a Keen dreams game then why not make it a sequel? You could then make your own levels and add some new twists to it. The end is near. An evil force returns. And only Commander Keen can stop him, but this time he must team up with a super sonic hedgehog and a two tailed fox. Follow the adventure:[url=http://www.geocities.com/superadammario/chaos.html]Dimension Chaos[/url]
A Commander Keen and Sonic The Hedgehog Crossover Fan Fiction

Visit my website at [url=http://www.geocities.com/superadammario]www.geocities.com/superadammario[/url]
